root: ^You pass by a door, but stop at the sounds of shouts coming from within. You had peered in from the entrance, seeing a bunch of people, mostly men, cheer on what you presumed were people fighting.
^A loud round of cheers resounded, and suddenly, a guy could be seen from the middle fist pumping the air in triumph. He seemed to revel in the crowd's love and adoration and it made you stare.
^When the next match started, you managed to find that same guy. He still had his wrestling attire on, a towel over his shoulders as he seemed to be resting from his match.
^He turned to you after noticed you, and his eyes lit up.
^???: "Hello!" he chirped happily, before looking at your attire, looking confused "Are you even a member here?"

Fan: ^You looked at him and made a split decision as you opened your mouth to speak.
^You: "I'm just such a big fan of you, I had to just talk to you. You did so well today!"
^His eyes widened, and so did his smile, a glow coming from him as he basically basked in your praise. Ah...so he was one of those people
Truth: ^You: "I need you with help for something."
^You say honestly, watching as his eyes dimmed and his posture shifted, relaxing.
^He said, his voice and volume deflating like a balloon.
Lie: ^You: "Oh yeah I'm in the club too."
^You quickly blurt out, watching as his face turned confused.
^He looked you up and down...then up and down again. You suddenly felt yourself get self conscious at him staring at you.
^You weren't that unfit... Raising his eyebrows he said,
^???: "Yeah...I don't believe you. Why are you really here?"
^You sighed, you should have known that saying a lie would be a stupid idea
^You had said, watching as his face started to change from realisation.
^You: "I need some volunteers for my last essay in Philosophy, and I was wondering if you'd be interested in being one?"
^He looked so nice as he smiled kindly at you, nodding as he replied.
^Faust: "Of course! I'd love to help you! I'm Faust by the way. Let's discuss the details."
^It took a few minutes to go through everything, and he had been agreed without no problems. He also mentioned he did Computer Sciences at the University which surprised you.
^You left after saying goodbye, leaving the room. Out of all the candidates so far, he seemed the most normal.
